summary:
- **Drilling Update**: Maiden drilling campaign at Zopkhito Sb-Au Project (7,000–10,000m) set to commence in July 2024, targeting resource conversion/expansion (foreign resource: 225Kt @ 11.6% Sb, 7.1Mt @ 3.7g/t Au).  
- **Capital Structure**: 775,134,025 shares; 80,000,000 performance rights; 20,000,000 options.  
- **Strategic Focus**: JORC-compliant resource conversion and preliminary economic assessment planned for the project.  

*No material trading or capital markets action items identified (operational update only).*
